website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for young novice players. Choose it if you are looking for smaller, lighter balls for kids learning the game.
pros: 2.5-inch plastic balls are durable yet lighter than regular bocce balls and easier to hold
cons: The balls are filled with liquid for weight, which concerns some parents
Not practical for adults or rough play

customer_reviews.title: Super fun family game!
customer_reviews.text: I bring this to the park with us every Saturday! We have a play group and kids/Adults of all ages like to play this. The water balls stand up to tons of abuse. After more than a year, one of the balls did crack slightly. I just refilled it with water and used a heated flathead screwdriver to reseal the plastic. It is 100% working and fine again. I can't tell you how much I like this set.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids - Case is crap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic balls partially filled with liquid. Good for kids, at least they won't get hurt if stepping in front of one. Carrying case fell apart in shipping. It's useless. But, for the price, the set will be good for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Squatch82

customer_reviews.title: Water filled...
customer_reviews.text: Expected the smaller size (great for my younger kids) but not the poor quality. The balls are super thin plastic filled with water. Didn't expect the water... it never mentioned anything in the description about them being water filled. The black case is super flimsy and arrived opened so the balls were not in the case and they were leaking water all over. Not happy. Sent this back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Kids love their Bocce Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved their new Bocce Ball Set. This set was great for playing in the yard and at the park. It also got the kids to play with this one vs. our resin set which gets damaged more easily. Durable plastic yet heavy for added fun for the kids. Two very enthusiastic thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Amador

customer_reviews.title: Blue balls not round. Decent otherwise. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for playing with kids and others who need light balls. My 11month old can palm them. They are weighty enough to roll well. My main issue is my blue balls aren’t round! They are practically flat
customer_reviews.author: Kait E.B.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids not adults
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting, I guess I didn't read where the description says beginners bocce ball. It will be great for the neice and nephew but the adults will think they are cheesy. The carrying case is nothing but what you see in the picture. In general i was disappointment when I opened the box and saw this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Game for Modified Senior Adult Program
customer_reviews.text: Our seniors in the assisted living community who are in wheelchairs needed these lightweight bocce balls in order to play the game and be included. These hollow bocce balls worked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive beginner set but did not get to use it
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive beginner set but did not get to use it. The product arrived missing one bocce ball and the white Jack. Returned to Amazon. But the balls themselves are of a thin plastic filled with water. The thin plastic makes it so that they dent easily. The product did have some dents when arriving which could probably be popped out. But while playing I imagine it happens more often.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Pyrenees

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my French class.
customer_reviews.text: As a high school French teacher I thought it would be nice for the kids to experience a the fun game of pétanque. I bought three sets and by the second class two balls have started leaking. The kids were not aggressive with them at all. The white ball (the jack) was a little hard for them to see, but at this price you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received an incomplete set...
customer_reviews.text: My set came without the white jack ball. I guess we can play using one of the other colors as the jack... I guess we can play using one of the other colors as the jack, but kind of frustrating to pay for a full set and not get what you paid for. Also, the balls aren’t really want I expected, but that’s probably my own fault for not fully reading the description. They’re filled with water, but still feel relatively sturdy I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This item was not as expected. The plastic balls ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was not as expected. The plastic balls are filled with water, which caused condensation in the cold, damaging a book in the same box. The carrying case is nothing more than thin plastic that awkwardly snaps together. Bought this as a gift, but would be embarrassed to give it.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a party or two
customer_reviews.text: This game set does work and is usable; however, it won't last a very long time. Maybe if you have kids playing with it but not if adults are the ones using it.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea for anyone over 3 or 4 years old.
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this item for a refund because it was not what I expected. The case is actually pretty flimsy, and the plastic that the (water filled) balls are made of is thin- so if the kids throw them too hard or they hit a hard surface like a road or sidewalk they are sure to break and leak. Even a light squeeze in my hand bent one. The age range if someone buys this should be 2-4yrs and no older, although a 4 year old may be able to break the bocce balls.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls, case is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Nice bocce set, the balls are heavy plastic and not too heavy so great for younger kids or elderly. The case is a pain in the rear. It's difficult to pull open and balls can fall out if not closed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Mellisue922

customer_reviews.title: Case came broken
customer_reviews.text: Balls are filled with liquid, and the carrying case came broken. Returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the plastic case was poor quality and won't stay closed. Also, one red ball is already leaking fluid! Very dissatisfied, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These is for kids but even though it’s fine to play
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: Save your $ and buy the official version.
customer_reviews.text: Good if you want to teach your 4 year old this game, but honestly not like the real deal. Save your money & buy the real game with official weight and size.
customer_reviews.author: pwizzy

customer_reviews.title: This is cost effective and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just in time for Christmas! Bought for a friend with whom we had strict holiday budget guidelines. This is cost effective and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: very light weight, filled with water or liquid instead ...
customer_reviews.text: very light weight, filled with water or liquid instead of sand, not equally heavy. I had to return, as they were not as quality as my previous set.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon&April

customer_reviews.title: ... snapped together or else you will lose the contents easily. It is light and easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: The case is flimsy and needs to be careful that it is snapped together or else you will lose the contents easily. It is light and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wont know for months
customer_reviews.text: I expect it to be good for mt grandsons but they wont play it until April the earliest
customer_reviews.author: R. Singerline

customer_reviews.title: Not complete
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to add to one we already have. The case is pretty flimsy and there was no pilot ball with the set, although the balls seem to be in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: calvin england

customer_reviews.title: Liquid filled. Not solid.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the little ones. But I didn't notice that they were liquid filled.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tolladay

customer_reviews.title: Good kids set
customer_reviews.text: Our kids (3 & 7) really like them, especially good for 6 and older. Good size and weight and the 4 colors allow 2 - 4 players.
customer_reviews.author: insightful frequent flyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to use the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Balls are fine. It is a fun game to play. You will need to find another way to carry them around though. This case is cheaply made and will not hold the balls at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received the set without the small ball and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the set without the small ball and I had only one red and three yellow balls...I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boccee set
customer_reviews.text: Great boccee set! The balls are the perfect weight for my daughter to throw but not too lite. A great price for a fun game that I can take anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: ricky ade

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Going to use for my Birthday. Great that it can be used both in and out
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Kids Version
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic and smaller size that the version I was attempting to replace. Definitely a kids version and not for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Graham

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balls are plastic and too light weight. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Not regulation size
customer_reviews.text: My fault...Bad me.....I did not read carefully. I was looking for regulation size. Seems like a decent product, especially for the price. This would be great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap plastic filled with water. The carrying case can barely keep the balls inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Balls are filled with liquid. Cheap plastic holder and balls are smaller than regulation set. Very disappointing as I had hoped to use this with my 4th graders for recess. This product wouldn't last a week. Will be returning and finding something else.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E. Teodosio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeping the rules simple in the yard and enjoying the game!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H. Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the grandkids. Now they can play bocce with us adults.
customer_reviews.author: Tony802

customer_reviews.title: This is great for kids since the balls are filled with liquid
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids since the balls are filled with liquid, so they wouldn't be too terribly painful if someone accidentally got bonked. The balls are just perfect for little hands too.
customer_reviews.author: YodaBest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for younger children
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 young grandchildren, 2 boys 7 &6 and 2 girls 5. These are the perfect size and weight. We are on vacation with 3 of them and they had a ball playing
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Other than that good
customer_reviews.text: To be a true bocce set it needs a little white ball as well. Other than that good set
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality broken in less than an hour
customer_reviews.text: Had for less than an hour before two balls popped, because their filled with water. Product is dollar tree quality.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Silka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young children
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for young children to get introduced to the game. Balls are relatively small and light, and a bit bouncy. Adults should look to purchase a real set.
customer_reviews.author: Maerev

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this because the balls were plastic and water-filled, but they have been great for a very reasonable price. We are having a great time with our set!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Worley

customer_reviews.title: Gift card needed.
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift, but had no way to request a gift card. Don’t know yet how this gift was experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Price

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Water inside balls leaked out the first time we played with them.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Order was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t aware that this was a beginner set when I ordered it. I don’t recall seeing that anywhere but it looks like a kids game and not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set for kids. They are a bit on the small side. Overall a good set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are water filled and I worry about longevity but otherwise they are great j
customer_reviews.author: Not Very Small

customer_reviews.title: liquid filled
customer_reviews.text: some reviews said these were filled with sand, some said liquid. i got liquid. i returned easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: nesnakes

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back as we received broken still waiting on the new set!!!! 😩
customer_reviews.author: wendy casey

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but for the price, good set.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic and water filled.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap water filled balls. The description did not say that at the time we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: If I could give negative stars I would.. ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would.. item only had 5 of the eight balls..and additionally was missing the small white ball... tag was of the carring case and plastic wrapping on item was opened. Definitely not a new item as site described..
customer_reviews.author: blake steed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: About the size of tennis balls and not super heavy. Great for playing with kids
customer_reviews.author: aimee ask

customer_reviews.title: Great for game night in the yard
customer_reviews.text: Supplier was quick to ship and came as pictured. Great for game night in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for younger kids. I bought it for my middle school kids and it didn't hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: GGHale

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and cheap. I think I could find this item at a dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn02

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without the little white ball that is supposed to come in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun, and great for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was speedy and I was very happy with the product. Thank you very much!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet A. St.Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Next time I will read specifications
customer_reviews.text: My fault this is not a full size bocce set
customer_reviews.author: Rock N Roll

customer_reviews.title: good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Too small for what we wanted, returned it for larger size.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: We received it.
customer_reviews.text: This is for a Christmas gift so we don't know if it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Pippitt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Will break immediately.
customer_reviews.text: These things are especially cheap. They are filled with water and one has already during the first time using them. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great children's set. Not to heavy to carry, fun!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the bocce balls were filled with water. I was expecting a much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: SMALL PLASTIC BALLS WITH WATER INSIDE
customer_reviews.text: If this is what you are looking for, then they will be just what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E. Secord

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product but was to be expected for price. Shipping was fast and reliable
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: They're probably nice for kids
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting bocce balls in the normal size, but these were the size of tennis balls. They're probably nice for kids, just not what I expected. I suppose it's my fault for not reading all details.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C. Annis

customer_reviews.title: filled with water, not sand
customer_reviews.text: The very first Q&A indicates they are filled with sand. They are not. They are filled with water. I'm perfectly comfortable that they are really intended for all ages, including very young. I bought it fully aware that it's not meant to be an expensive set. I wanted it for family fun. The fact that they are filled with water and not sand just really earked me.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: This is a plastic water filled ball set. The picture is deceiving. I thought I was getting the real deal at a great price. I feel "duped". I think this set's value should be priced at about $6.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: boccia set
customer_reviews.text: everybody loves them, great price, came also very soon delivered!
customer_reviews.author: andrea thumeyer

product_meta.title: 4-Player Bocce Set with Carrying Case | Set of Soft, Lightweight Plastic Balls Protect Any Surface | Kids and Adults Outdoor Portable Lawn Game Set | Picnics, Parties and Tailgating Activity
feature_bullets: BEGINNER BOCCE: Take home a beginner's set of Bocce Ball! Bocce is a mix of bowling, croquet, and shuffleboard. Great for players of all ages!
FAMILY-SIZED FUN: Our beginner set includes 8 bocce balls for four players or four teams of two
SOFT, SAFE BALLS: The 2.5", half-pound plastic balls are softer, safer, lighter, and easier to throw for young players. Play the game on any surface without causing damage
SIMPLE RULES, ENDLESS STRATEGY: Easy to play, hard to master! Simple rules mean just about any flat surface is a potential bocce court. Outwit and out-toss your opponents!

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY CASE: Each set comes in a hardy black plastic carrying case and includes a white jack. Great for travelling to picnics, tailgates, camping trips, concerts, corporate events, and much more!
